A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Luke was ruined. Yoda ruined. Forced comedy\, forced story\, no tension\, no excitement. I was bored in the movie theater. WTF was I watching? Snokes is a nobody\, Rey is a nobody\, stupid animated animals everywhere. Here’s the story. The empire chases the rebels at 5mph and waits for them to run out of gas. Yoda’s force ghost calls forth lightning from the clouds\, Lea uses the force to fly in space and Luke dies from being tired. The end... of Star Wars.
